content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Case Of Deadly Devotion, the May 17, 1950, episode from Mr. District Attorney.

(26:07) Crime Classics brings us our second episode, theirs from December 30, 1953. We’ll hear Coyle And Richardson: Why They Hung In A Spanking Breeze.

Download CaseClosed725

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
